context_of_use: This use case allows customers and admins to view and download general and sales-related reports.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze data offline
admin: wants to monitor business performance
description: This use case enables customers and admins to view and download reports for analysis.
triggering_event: The user requests to view reports.
preconditions: The user has permission to view reports.
postconditions: The user successfully views and downloads the requested reports.
assumptions: The system has reports available for viewing and downloading.
The user has the necessary permissions to access the reports.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to view and download reports.
The system shall allow admins to view sales reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for viewing and downloading.
main_flow: 1. customer/admin requests to view reports → system displays available reports.
2. customer/admin selects a report to view → system retrieves and displays the report.
3. customer/admin chooses to download the report → system initiates the download process.
